h2_title: Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter
content: Taking off one of his arms will deal a chunk of damage, but if you can try targeting both of his extra arms, removing them both will instantly deplete his health, and begin the second phase where demands a true fight: two arms vs two arms.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Venom_Daoist.md', within the main section titled 'Venom Daoist', specifically from the subsection 'Venom Daoist Boss Fight and Guide - Second Encounter'.
The content is as follows:
Taking off one of his arms will deal a chunk of damage, but if you can try targeting both of his extra arms, removing them both will instantly deplete his health, and begin the second phase where demands a true fight: two arms vs two arms.
